title: Eastern River
text: The Eastern River is a tributary of the <a href="Kennebec%20River">Kennebec River</a> in <a href="Maine">Maine</a>. It rises in <a href="Pittston%2C%20Maine">East Pittston</a> at the confluence of its <a href="West%20Branch%20Eastern%20River">west</a> and <a href="East%20Branch%20Eastern%20River">east</a> branches and flows southwest past <a href="Dresden%2C%20Maine">Dresden Mills</a> to its mouth at the Kennebec, at the town boundary between Dresden and <a href="Perkins%2C%20Maine">Perkins</a>.
